definition: The Cherry Orchard, a play by Chekhov 契訶夫|契诃夫[Qi4 he1 fu1]
see 櫻桃小嘴|樱桃小嘴[ying1 tao2 xiao3 zui3]
lit. cherry mouth (idiom)/fig. a delicate, ruby-lipped mouth
see 聖女果|圣女果[sheng4 nu:3 guo3]

sentences.english: The summer rainstorm was also one of the meteorological disasters which reduce the production of large cherry.
sentences.chinese: 夏季暴雨也是影响大樱桃生产的气象灾害之一。

sentences.english: It is the emblematic red grape of Argentinean. Pleasant aroma to raspberries, cherries and plums with intense purple color.
sentences.chinese: 果香怡人，树莓，樱桃和李子的芬芳浓郁，呈酱紫色。

sentences.english: Bright dark cherry red colour with brick- red hints.
sentences.chinese: 略带砖红色的明亮深樱桃红。

sentences.english: Next,put a cherry in the middle.
sentences.chinese: 其次，在中间放一个樱桃。

sentences.english: Classic German-style flavor, a perfect cherry and strawberry cake.
sentences.chinese: 徳式传统经典风味，酒酿樱桃的完美呈现。

sentences.english: Bushels of ripe cherries spring forth from trees pollinated by honeybees.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂为樱桃树授粉，孕育出大量成熟的樱桃。

sentences.english: Bushels of ripe cherries spring forth from trees pollinated by honeybees.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂为樱桃树授粉，孕育出大量成熟的樱桃。

sentences.english: I think I'll have a Dry Sherry instead of the kirsch.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一杯没有甜味的雪利酒，不要樱桃酒。

sentences.english: There was even cherry pie, for dessert.
sentences.chinese: 还有樱桃派做饭后的甜点。

sentences.english: The cherry-trees will blossom next month.
Once eat cherry attack discomfort, clearing away heat and toxic material available sugar cane juice.
sentences.chinese: 一旦吃多了樱桃发作不适，可用甘蔗汁清热解毒。

sentences.english: Council of Ministers raised the theater with "a" square tower "is" a stylish matching cherry finish.
sentences.chinese: 该剧院电梯内阁匹配方塔采用的是时尚的樱桃完成。

sentences.english: Deep cherry red colour with light brick edges.
sentences.chinese: 鲜艳的深樱桃红色带红边，色泽清晰。

sentences.english: Cherry pits are full of cyanogenic glycosides.
Dark ruby cherry colour with light brick edges.
sentences.chinese: 绚丽的深樱桃色带红边，色泽清晰。

sentences.english: Very very slow small cherry dining.
sentences.chinese: 小樱桃就餐十分十分慢。
